Â Â Â Xiao Qin pipa elegant and beautiful, such as listening to The Sound of Zen Buddhist Poems Apprehension xujing song Zen painting as the mountains.

The oldest image of the perfect combination of the new century music, take you into a holy cool world. Years ago I planned recording of "Qin Xiao songs in" Please Professor Zhang Weiliang flute ceremony, Professor Zhao Jiazhen piano, masters side by side, perfect match, after the "Longyuan" Producers and Distributors. "Longyuan" The launch of Zen Buddhist Music "empty mountain nobody", not a replica of Buddhist chanting, but the adaptation or creation, still koto and flute mainly listen to down a clean feeling.

The two mountains Supreme refined elegance of the song as the Zen. One is based on two Supreme Buddhist Poems known, hidden under the South Putuo Temple in Xiamen Wulaofeng of ÅšÄ«labhadra Master; second is famous Zen painting, hidden in Zhongnan foot Buddha Master Ching Chuang law. This two with a contemporary monk wonderful Cham Master sects, are truly monks quit line, which in today's world monk, is rare.
